content: TOKYO Even though the Federal Reserve is expected to raise interest rates  long-term U.S. bond yields are unlikely to rise due to China's slowdown and negative rates in Japan and Europe  the top fund manager of Invesco Ltd's  $240 bln global bond funds said.

title: Invesco: long-term U.S. bond yields unlikely to rise even if Fed hikes
